synopsis.text: Nijino Yume and her fellow students from Yotsusei Gakuen embark on an exciting journey to a tropical southern island, where a prestigious Legendary Dress Audition is being held. The challenge? To locate hidden secret dresses scattered across the island, promising an adventure filled with mystery and intrigue. Join Yume and her friends as they race against time to uncover these elusive garments and participate in the audition, making this anime a thrilling watch for fans of competition and discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
